How it works

We keep the process simple with transparent quotes, mobile repairs, and finishes that last.

Schedule a free estimate

Use our online form, email, or a quick call to book a time that works around your schedule.

We assess and prep on-site

Our mobile leather specialists arrive with tools and swatches so you can see the planned fixes before we begin.

Precision finish and delivery

We repair seams, scratches, and fading before sealing the work with industry-grade coatings that outlast daily use.

Services

LeatherFixPro is trained on domestic, luxury, and commercial materials—each service includes site-safe prep, precise dye matching, and protective finishing.

Leather Repair & Recoloring

From cracked seats to surface staining, we restore leather to a near-original finish without the need for replacement panels.

  • Crack & split repair
  • Color matching and dyeing
  • UV-protective sealants

Vinyl + Plastic Restoration

Dashboards, consoles, and trim components receive flexible coatings that match the factory texture and sheen.

  • Warped vinyl smoothing
  • Cup holder and trim refinish
  • Dashboard UV defense

Commercial & Marine Interiors

High-traffic furniture, RV lounges, and marine cabins get tailored restoration plans built for frequent use and easy cleaning.

  • Hospitality repair programs
  • Boat sofas + counter work
  • Fleet-ready durability upgrades

Recent on-site work across automotive, marine, and residential interiors. Tap any preview to open the lightbox and see the finish in more detail.

FAQs

Common questions about turnaround time, coverage, and warranty.

Do you travel to my location?

Yes, we operate a mobile studio across the Greater Metro area and can often arrive within 48 hours of booking.

How long does a typical restoration take?

Most repairs finish within a single day, but complex vehicles or large commercial orders are scheduled over 2–3 days for careful curing.

Can you match custom colors?

Absolutely. We mix dyes on-site to match factory shades or custom palettes and provide swatches for your approval.

Is there a warranty?

All work carries a 12-month service warranty and recommendations for upkeep to keep the repaired areas looking fresh.
